suites.notes: mostSignificantRegression: auto<=full*1.05 {dirtyRootsRatio=0.75} (before=2000, after=null); stabilityWarning: metric=runtime.txnCommitMs {convergeMode=dirty&dirtyRootsRatio=0.75&steps=800} baselineP95=2.40ms afterP95=8.27ms diff=5.86ms limit=5.00ms (possible causes: tab switch, power-saving mode, background load, browser/version drift)
